thread.title: Kevin Robertson
thread.title_full: Otticanet recensione scritta da Kevin Robertson

author: Kevin Robertson
title: Kevin Robertson
text: I had a few reservations about ordering eyeglasses from a company in Italy when I live in America. If something went wrong, I thought, it would be impossible to resolve the issue. However, my concerns were relieved because their Customer Service Department ALWAYS responded to my questions VERY quickly. They kept me informed throughout the entire process. Also, shipping was SUPER-FAST. I recommend OTTICANET.com to anyone searching for a great deal and GREAT customer service.
